name: Scalloped Potatoes
comments: We always serve this with Ribbon Meat Loaf.
ingredients: 1 can cream of mushroom soup (or cream of chicken)
instructions: Place half the potatoes in an 8x12" dish. In small saucepan, heat and mix remaining ingredients. Pour half on potatoes; place remaining potatoes on top and add the rest of the sauce.
Top with cheese and bake for about 30 minutes (should be bubbly and/or lightly browned on edges).
